channel.title: Donateion
channel.description:
i was wondering if there is a site like paypal where u can donate to someones server by sms
1 of my players has spare money on his phone and whats to donate to my server through sms
is there any site that does this?

item.title: Donateion
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“no1toldme2, post:6, topic:399614”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=496746.msg3632277#msg3632277 date=1308333113]
My god, I know this sites full of 10 and twelve year old’s but most of them can get a B+ on their third grade spelling test to spell Donation.
[/quote]
B+? why are you sticking up for him :D.[/quote]
I said “Most of them can at least get a B+” which is making fun of him because he can’t even get a B+ on a spelling test for a 3rd grader which have about 4 letters for each word.

Read full topic
